document.full_text: japan's biggest earthquake on record hit toyota motor's quarterly profits harder than expected, prompting renewed calls for the government to do more to support toyota's pledge to keep building large numbers of cars in japan.
document.title: toyota vows to stay in japan as quake hits q4
lines_and_colors: japan's biggest earthquake on record hit toyota motor's quarterly profits harder than expected, prompting renewed calls for the government to do more to support toyota's pledge to keep building large numbers of cars in japan.
